title: Hide PhonePe UPI ID in Frontend UI

requirements.summary: Hide or obscure the UPI ID in the frontend payment UI, displaying only partial digits or a masked version
acceptanceCriteria: The UPI ID is not displayed in full plain text in the PaymentQRSection component
Users can still complete payments via QR code or deep link without seeing the complete UPI ID
The payment flow remains functional with the masked UPI ID display

file_operations.description: Modify the PaymentQRSection component to mask the UPI ID display. Instead of showing the full UPI ID '9392412728-2@axl', display only partial digits (e.g., '93924*****@axl' or '****2728@axl'). Ensure the QR code and deep link functionality remain unchanged and still use the complete UPI ID internally. The masking should be applied only to the text display visible to users, not to the payment processing logic.

Review the usePhonePePayment hook to ensure the UPI ID used for generating payment deep links and QR codes remains unmasked internally. The hook should continue to use the full UPI ID from the backend for payment processing, while any display or logging of the UPI ID should use a masked version if exposed to the user.
